Producer: Leesa Kahn, Andrea Keir, David Oyelowo, Steve Richards, James Spring
Production Co: Creasun Entertainment, Lakeview Entertainment (II), Fred Films, Hammerstone Studios, Yoruba Saxon Productions, Endurance Media, TinRes Entertainment, ACE Pictures Entertainment
Rating: PG (Some Violence|Fantasy Action|Strong Thematic Content|Unsettling Images)
Synopsis: Eight-year-old Alice and her mischievous brother Peter journey to London to sell a treasured heirloom. Returning home, Alice seeks temporary refuge in a wondrous rabbit hole, while Peter enters a magical realm as leader of the lost boys.
Title: Come Away
